QuestData.Title: Warchief's Command: Western Plaguelands!
QuestData.Description: All able bodied members of the Horde are hereby ordered to report to Koltira Deathweaver at Andorhal.$B$BThe Alliance forces are advancing into the ruined city of Andorhal, seeking to claim it for themselves. We must counter them before they can gain a foothold there!$B$BCross the Bulwark at the eastern end of Tirisfal Glades and follow the roads southeast to Andorhal and meet up with our forces there.$B$BDestiny calls!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Koltira Deathweaver at Andorhal in the Western Plaguelands.
QuestData.RewardText: Is this all the warchief can spare? Don't worry, you'll be put to good use.
